name: egen-meeting-notes-functions
description: Cloud Functions for Egen Meeting Notes

scripts.deploy:classify: gcloud functions deploy classify --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --entry-point classify --source=. --project=karthik-patil-sandbox --region=us-central1 --gen2
scripts.deploy:saveNote: gcloud functions deploy saveNote --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --entry-point saveNote --source=. --project=karthik-patil-sandbox --region=us-central1 --gen2
scripts.deploy:share: gcloud functions deploy share --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --entry-point share --source=. --project=karthik-patil-sandbox --region=us-central1 --gen2
scripts.deploy:feedback: gcloud functions deploy feedback --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --entry-point feedback --source=. --project=karthik-patil-sandbox --region=us-central1 --gen2
scripts.deploy:updateNote: gcloud functions deploy updateNote --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --entry-point updateNote --source=. --project=karthik-patil-sandbox --region=us-central1 --gen2
scripts.deploy:processNewNote: gcloud functions deploy processNewNote --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --entry-point processNewNote --source=. --project=karthik-patil-sandbox --region=us-central1 --gen2
scripts.deploy:processFile: gcloud functions deploy processFile --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --entry-point processFile --source=. --project=karthik-patil-sandbox --region=us-central1 --gen2
scripts.deploy:registerDriveWebhook: gcloud functions deploy registerDriveWebhook --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --entry-point registerDriveWebhook --source=. --project=karthik-patil-sandbox --region=us-central1 --gen2
scripts.deploy:unregisterDriveWebhook: gcloud functions deploy unregisterDriveWebhook --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --entry-point unregisterDriveWebhook --source=. --project=karthik-patil-sandbox --region=us-central1 --gen2
scripts.deploy:getDriveWebhookConfig: gcloud functions deploy getDriveWebhookConfig --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --entry-point getDriveWebhookConfig --source=. --project=karthik-patil-sandbox --region=us-central1 --gen2
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:classify && npm run deploy:saveNote && npm run deploy:share && npm run deploy:feedback && npm run deploy:updateNote && npm run deploy:processNewNote && npm run deploy:processFile && npm run deploy:registerDriveWebhook && npm run deploy:unregisterDriveWebhook && npm run deploy:getDriveWebhookConfig
scripts.deploy:prod:classify: gcloud functions deploy classify --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-http --entry-point classify --source=. --project=karthik-patil-sandbox --region=us-central1 --gen2 --no-allow-unauthenticated
